content.rendered:
Easy Veggie Samoosas

Ingredients

Ingredients
1 boxFry’s Meat Free Mince
½ onion, chopped
1 tomato, chopped
Samosa Pastry
Garlic to taste
Oil

Directions

Sauté onion, chilli and garlic until softened and combined. Add the Mince and cook for a further 8 minutes. Add the chopped tomato and simmer until heated through.

Allow mixture to cool and spoon into the samoosa pastry. Heat oil in a heavy-based pan. Deep fry samoosas until golden brown.

Serve hot. Too easy. Too good.
